original_text: But when it came before the king, he gave orders in writing that his evil plan that he had devised against the Jews should return on his own head, and that he and his sons should be hanged on the gallows.
korean_text: 에스더가 왕 앞에 나아감으로 말미암아 왕이 조서를 내려 하만이 유다인을 해하려던 악한 꾀를 그의 머리에 돌려보내어 하만과 그의 여러 아들을 나무에 달게 하였으므로

sentences.original_text: But when it came before the king,
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그 일이 왕 앞에 올라갔을 때,

sentences.original_text: that he had devised against the Jews
should return on his own head,
and that he and his sons
should be hanged on the gallows.
